revised_title: The Legacy of Frank Sturdy Sinnatt: A Pioneer in Fuel Technology
tldr: Frank Sturdy Sinnatt was a prominent figure in fuel technology, making significant contributions to the field of coal resources and fuel research. He played a crucial role in the development of the National Coal Survey, which helped in understanding the composition and properties of coal seams across the country. Sinnatt's passion for fuel technology and his dedication to improving the nation's fuel resources made him a valuable asset to the Department of Scientific and Industrial Research and a respected figure in the field of applied chemistry.
